review: He is a well educated and well experienced dentist doctor. I am visiting him from last 28 years. I always get complete satisfaction everytime i visit him. I will recommend him for general and cosmetic dentistry. He is a very good and very humble gentle man also, on personal front.

My recent visit to Family Dental Clinic exceeded all expectations. The staff was friendly, the facilities were spotless, and the service was exceptional. From check-in to treatment, every step was seamless. I left feeling confident in my oral health and grateful for such a positive experience. Highly recommend!
reply_text: Thank you so much, Mr. Pankaj, for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our business. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we truly appreciate your support.

review: I went for root canal treatment at the Family Dental Clinic. Dr. Ajay Arora is a very good dentist. Their explanation of the issue is very good, and my experience is good. Recommended.Â
